description: “Teach Almost Anyone Almost Anything” is a course designed for individuals who are not experienced at writing courses, but find that they need to do so. It is also an excellent primer for those who are just interested in learning about how to teach. It covers the basics of the Instructional Design discipline in very simple and clear terms, using real-world examples. It also contains a number of resources that students may want to leverage at a later date.
title: Teach Almost Anyone Almost Anything
